address: Budapest XIII.ker. Ipoly utca 16. mezzanine floor 3. doorbell number 8
approach: The cosmetics can be reached in a 10-minute walk from the M3 subway stop Lehel square. By car, you can easily find a parking space nearby, which is controlled until 10:00 p.m.!
payment: Payment by cash or instant transfer is available in my cosmetics.
gift_cards: After payment, the personalized Gift Voucher and Pass (indicating the amount of the payment) will be issued and a photo of this certificate will be sent /sms,messenger,email/.
open: According to the needs of my clients, we always find a suitable time!
